DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Dual Action Pneumatic Compression System : Tolerance Comfort Patients With Venous Leg Ulcers ( VLUs )
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects chronic venous leg ulcer participate 2 week run phase use standard care multi-layer bandaging receive 4 week treatment use pneumatic compression device . Subjects see clinic weekly evaluation , complete symptom quality life questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Subject must ≥ 18 year age legal age time enrollment . Chronic venous insufficiency confirm ultrasound within previous 12 month . Active ulceration ( CEAP classification C6 ) Ulcer duration : ≥ 2 month great 24 month non heal VLU conservative treatment . Ulcer size ≥ 2cm2 ≤ 50cm2 Leg circumference within follow range : Ankle 12 44cm ; Calf 22 60cm ; Below knee 22 68cm Target ulcer ulcer study limb involve exposure tendon , muscle , bone . Greater 3 separate full thickness ulcer study limb Target ulcer nonvenous etiology ( sickle cell anemia , necrobiosis lipoidica diabeticorum , pyoderma , malignancy ) . Treatment target ulcer live cellular therapy within 30 day time enrollment . History acute deep vein thrombosis ( DVT ) pulmonary embolism ( PE ) within last 3 month . Either dorsalis pedis ( DP ) posterior tibial ( PT ) systolic pressure < 80mmHg diabetic patient < 60mmHg nondiabetic patient study limb transcutaneous partial pressure oxygen ( Tcp02 ) ≤ 30mmHg great toe systolic pressure ≤ 40mmHg . Acute thrombophlebitis . History pulmonary edema decompensated congestive heart failure . Currently active infection skin cellulitis require antibiotic . History cancer within last 5 year exception treat nonmelanoma skin cancer cervical carcinoma situ . Poorly control diabetes Hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) value > 12 % . Changes medication affect edema within last 30 day Need current ongoing therapy corticosteroid ( exception continue low dose usage ) cytotoxic drug current use Daflon 500 . Currently pregnant try become pregnant . Inability unwillingness participate aspect study protocol . Currently participate another clinical trial .
